item.description:
Enjoy the discussion over dinner with other humanists!

This month our Hartford-area dinner will be at Lemongrass, a Thai restaurant in West Hartford. There's ample free parking near the restaurant, as well as an inexpensive lot behind it. We've moved the event to Thursday as organizer Carol has several other events the preceding evening that she wants to attend. So join us and find out what she actually decided to do: knitting or comedy!

You can get more information about our group at http://www.cthumanist....
item.name: Hartford Area Social Dinner at Lemongrass
